entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 41 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
